name: Navalny: jailbreak (Yelamargun)
description:
Do not fall into the clutches of riot police!

Help Navalny to collect sand coins and don't end up back in jail.

The game is an endless runner (endless runner), like a subway, but in the conditions of Moscow and you yourself know what events)

Russian opposition leader, lawyer, political and public figure. He positions himself as the main opponent of the Russian leadership headed by Vladimir Putin.

The budget of Navalny's investigations on YouTube depends on these sands of coins (Navalny's reviews on the Alexei Navalny channel)

3D graphics, fast and challenging game play

Navalny 2024

Will return and continue to work for Navalny life and will be your pocket bulk on youtube.
